search.query: | inputlookup meta_woot | dedup index | fields index | sort index
| inputlookup meta_woot where index=$index$ | dedup sourcetype | fields sourcetype | sort sourcetype

index=`meta_woot_read_summary` sourcetype=meta_woot orig_sourcetype!=stash orig_sourcetype=* orig_host=* orig_index=* | stats sum(count) as events by orig_host orig_sourcetype orig_index | rename orig_host as host, orig_sourcetype as sourcetype, orig_index as index | join type=outer index sourcetype [ | tstats summariesonly=t sum("License_Usage.b") AS "total_bytes" from datamodel=Meta_Woot_License_Usage where (nodename = License_Usage) groupby "License_Usage.idx" "License_Usage.st" | rename License_Usage.st as sourcetype, License_Usage.idx as index | replace "default" with "main" in index] | fillnull value="0" total_bytes | eventstats sum(events) as total_events by index sourcetype | eval license_per_event=total_bytes/total_events | eval license_usage=(license_per_event*events)/1024/1024/1024 | fields - total_bytes total_events | search host=$host$ index=$index$ sourcetype=$sourcetype$ | eval license_per_event=round(license_per_event,2), license_usage=round(license_usage,2) | sort - license_usage | rename license_per_event AS "license_per_event (bytes)", license_usage AS "total_license_usage (gb)", events AS total_events
